name: Paint Pong (Kyenzo)
description:
Paint Pong is a 3D Pong prototype.  I would appreciate some feedback on how to improve upon what is here, whether it is pointing out bugs or adding different features or modes.  I will likely make a few iterations of Paint Pong, so this project will hopefully evolve over time.  

This is a 2 player split-screen game for Windows that can be played using 2 controllers (Xbox controllers, for example).  Since the game is meant to be played by 2 players, it was somewhat difficult to test it well on my own.  So please let me know how it goes with 2 people playing.   The objective is to hit the red ball for 10 points until you achieve 100 points.  Any other color ball will subtract 2 points though.

The controls are Up, Down, Left, and Right on the left thumbstick.  You may select how many balls you would like to use and the speed at which they move by using the menu before the game starts.  Please adjust the parameters in the menu to see what your computer can handle.  I would like to know what range of parameters to include in the final version of the game to make it more playable.  Escape and the Q key quit the game.    Please enjoy!
